text: Hagi Babiloni vahe havi anumzanku'ma Beliema nehaza anumzana, Nagra knaza ami'na azeri haviza hanugeno, maka zama asgahu nakri'nea zantamimo'a agipinti rukha huramigahie. Ana hanige'za ru moparegati'ma Babiloni vahe'ma eme nezamagaza zana eme ozmagegahaze. Ana nehina Babiloni kumamofo have keginamo'a mopafi faragu vaziramigahie.
